content.question: Which of the following could be an expression for <math alttext="f open parentheses theta close parentheses"> <mi>f</mi> <mfenced> <mi>θ</mi> </mfenced> </math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="6 cos open parentheses 4 theta close parentheses"><mn>6</mn><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>
<math alttext="6 cos open parentheses 2 theta close parentheses"><mn>6</mn><mi>cos</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>
<math alttext="6 sin open parentheses 4 theta close parentheses"><mn>6</mn><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>
<math alttext="6 sin open parentheses 2 theta close parentheses"><mn>6</mn><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="6 sin open parentheses 2 theta close parentheses"><mn>6</mn><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>θ</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Construct equivalent graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations of functions that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context, with and without technology.
